level.heading: INVITATION FOR BIDS IN THE SET-ASIDE MARKET (ยง 27-1504)

level.text: Before the contracting officer restricts an IFB to the small business set-aside market, the contracting officer shall determine that:

There is a reasonable expectation that bids will be obtained from at least two (2) responsible certified small business enterprises certified by the Department of Small and Local Business Development (DSLBD); and
An award will be made at reasonable prices.
